title: This Rajasthan City Has Launched AI-Powered Traffic System To Cut Congestion
description: Udaipur has introduced an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven traffic signal system at the busy Fatehpura intersection. The pilot project aims to streamline traffic flow, reduce congestion and save commuters' time.
content:

title: IIT Guwahati's first Data Science and AI batch records 91 % placements
description: The Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at IIT Guwahati has celebrated the graduation of its first batch with an impressive 91 percent placement rate.
content:
The first batch of students from the Mehta Family School of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (MFSDS & AI) at IIT Guwahati has successfully graduated, recording an impressive 91 percent placement rate.

title: EU to launch 6 more artificial intelligence factories
description: The EU's European High-Performance Computing Partnership Initiative (Euro HPC), announced Friday that six more artificial intelligence (AI) factories will be established
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence To Help Control Traffic Congestion In Rajasthan's Udaipur
description: The AI-driven traffic management system began its trial run on Friday, marking a new era in intelligent urban transport in Rajasthan.
content:
Udaipur has taken a decisive step towards easing its traffic woes -- Artificial Intelligence (AI) will now manage traffic signals at the city's busy Fatehpura intersection, officials said.

title: OpenAI, Sur Energy weigh $25 billion Argentina data center project
description: OpenAI and Sur Energy are set to build a massive data center in Argentina. This project, valued up to $25 billion, will support advanced artificial intelligence computing. The facility will have a capacity of 500 megawatts. This initiative is expected to be one of the largest technology and energy infrastructure projects in Argentina's history.

title: Google joins with University of Arkansas, A-State systems for artificial intelligence training
description: As part of Google's $4 billion investment in a data center in West Memphis, the tech giant announced that the University of Arkansas and Arkansas State University system will participate in its first cohort of the Google AI for Education Accelerator program.

title: The AI you use daily is changing fast-it's disappearing into everything.
description: Nowhere and everywhere, artificial intelligence is hiding in plain sight—in everything from software to surroundings.
content: AI has begun to shift from standalone apps to integration deep inside the software we use. From there, it’s making its way to becoming embedded in the things we use, such as cars, lights, speakers, and other devices that sense and respond. The Intern... [4355 chars]

title: New AI system revolutionizes drug design and vaccine development
description: The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the field of structural biology. In May 2024, DeepMind and Isomorphic Labs launched AlphaFold 3 (AF3), a revolutionary AI system capable of predicting the 3D structures and interactions of proteins, nucleic acids, small molecules, ions, and other biomolecules with remarkable precision.

title: AI in School Curriculum: CBSE to introduce artificial intelligence from Class 3 in 2026-27
description: India to integrate AI into school curriculum from Class 3 in 2026-27. CBSE drafting framework; over one crore teachers to be trained for AI learning.
content: The Ministry of Education is set to introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the school curriculum for all students from Class 3 onwards from next academic year (2026-27) and a framework is being developed for AI integration across grades, according... [1702 chars]
